Variable Documentation

SOC_HwAttrib gSOCHwAttrib

This is the global SOC hardware attributes which are defined for each supported SOC.

This is the global SOC hardware attributes which are defined for each supported SOC.

The structure describes the hardware attributes which is needed to initialize and setup the SOC Driver. This is defined for the XWR14xx device and should NOT be changed

This is the global SOC hardware attributes which are defined for each supported SOC.

The structure describes the hardware attributes which is needed to initialize and setup the SOC Driver. This is defined for the XWR16xx DSS and should NOT be changed

This is the global SOC hardware attributes which are defined for each supported SOC.

The structure describes the hardware attributes which is needed to initialize and setup the SOC Driver. This is defined for the XWR16xx MSS and should NOT be changed

The structure describes the hardware attributes which is needed to initialize and setup the SOC Driver. This is defined for the XWR18xx DSS and should NOT be changed

The structure describes the hardware attributes which is needed to initialize and setup the SOC Driver. This is defined for the XWR18xx MSS and should NOT be changed
